cms.query.QueryText: INSERT INTO [CMS_ContentRelationship] VALUES ((SELECT $node_id FROM [CMS_ContentRelationshipItem] WHERE [ContentRelationshipItemObjectType] = @ContentRelationshipSourceObjectType AND [ContentRelationshipItemObjectID] = @ContentRelationshipSourceObjectID), (SELECT $node_id FROM [CMS_ContentRelationshipItem] WHERE [ContentRelationshipItemObjectType] = @ContentRelationshipTargetObjectType AND [ContentRelationshipItemObjectID] = @ContentRelationshipTargetObjectID), @ContentRelationshipGUID, @ContentRelationshipGroupGUID, @ContentRelationshipSourceObjectType, @ContentRelationshipSourceObjectID, @ContentRelationshipTargetObjectType, @ContentRelationshipTargetObjectID, @ContentRelationshipSiteID, @ContentRelationshipGroupType); SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY() AS [ID]
